about_the_game:
New update.
- Spanish translation system.
- New events.
- New sounds.
- A reference point on the screen to better access objects. (Only visible when you are near them).
- More detailed objectives.
- Environment improvements.
- More detailed story progress.
- Some minor bugs fixed.

Important Note:

This game focuses on exploration and gradually creates tension to offer a deeper experience. The story takes place inside a house where paranormal events happen.

Ritual is a first-person psychological horror game.

Environment

Immerse yourself in this sinister experience of terror, where everything familiar becomes strange to you, find the necessary elements to complete the ritual and solve the mystery.
The game takes place in a simple and familiar environment that will gradually become your worst nightmare. He solves the unknowns left by William's father after his death and discovers his hidden past.

The subject of the game

This game takes place in a small house, in which you will have to close the portal to another dimension that your father opened before his death. You will have to explore every room and corner of this house to find the objects that will serve to close this portal.

Developer's comment:
The supernatural beings in this game may not harm you physically, but they can harm your psychology. It is our recommendation that people who are afraid of the dark, heart problems and fear being alone. Play with caution.

name: Ritual

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Ritual is a first-person psychological horror game. Immerse yourself in this sinister experience of terror, where everything familiar becomes strange to you, find the necessary elements to complete the ritual and solve the mystery.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
